column1: Gandevi is a City and a Municipality in Navsari district  in the state of Gujarat

column2: Gandevi had a total population of 15
column4: 243 households with an even sex ratio. Gandevi has an average literacy rate of 77%
column5: higher than the national average of 59.5%. Male literacy is around 81%
column6: and female literacy is around 72%. 10% of the population is under 6 years of age.
